text.tspan: What if the hero were a little flightless bird? He can only fly if he's skinny and has a LOT of energy.
Of course the more he eats, the fatter he gets so he can't fly much at all. :)
There could be different types of blocks to walk on, sort of like arkanoid.
The food is just birdseed or something.
Some platforms could require you to be heavy so that you can lower them.
Sometimes if you lower one of these, another one goes up?
Others could be like treadmills... You have to walk fast enough on
them in the right direction to power something... Like a door.
Or to MOVE something, like a ladder or obstacle.
The floors can light up showing how much more power/weight you
need to activate the thing.
Some platforms are trampolines. You land on one of these and you
bounce. Your weight and accelleration change how high you bounce.
We still have doors, which lead to other doors on screen or to the exit
for the level, and ladders.
Maybe we can move the ladders around with the platforms?
The game could be sort of like an elaborate chicken coop that you are
trying to ecsape.
Get points by rescuing the eggs on the level before you escape?
more concept art for trailblazer game
